caption: This restaurant gives awesome service and tasty menu. My favourite place around town. The food and drinks came out quick and the rates are reasonable. Highly recommended.
Fantastic food and amazing service

This was a wonderful lunch experience.  We were the first people in the building at 1130am sharp. They greeted us and explained how their covid procedures worked. The decor was wonderful and they have a diverse selection of sake. We order …
Excellent japanese food a little pricey but you won't be disappointed you get what you pay for...

So grateful I live so close to a good sushi restaurant. The sushi rolls are great, I often switch up what I get. My boyfriend doesn't eat fish so he gets teriyaki chicken with rice. Good sake and plum wine. Service is good. I had my bday …
Meal was ok. Nothing wrong with it, I think I just expected more.
Service is great! Everyone is always so friendly...the food is delicious and fresh... I really enjoy dining here!!!
The food was delicious!  Our server was good.  The atmosphere was comforting. I would come back!!
Sapporo is the best restaurant in downtown Hayward hands down
The menu and service were ahead of my expectations. I really enjoyed the atmosphere of this spot. Great place to take my family out for lunch.

I went to Sapporo last night. I don't know why city of Hayward is treating Sapporo restaurant so unfairly, they are a service,but they make them cross the street for dine-in. Food was 5 star delishious  service was great with having to dodge traffic and wait for crosswalk  still all in all I'll be going back for sure
I actually loved their dishes and service, great location next to my home. The workers are always super friendly. Will come visit again.

This spot is my preferred one. I go to a lot of restaurants but here I go the most. The stuff is very affectionate and the food they cook is so flavorful. I never miss an opportunity to have a decent dinner in this restaurant. I highly recommend this place.
GREAT PRICE. VERY CLEAN AND FLAVORFUL FOOD ENVIRONMENT. 1ST TIME THERE WILL DEFINITELY RETURN!!
Very great food and atmosphere :) will be coming back for sure!! :)
Very neat and convenient spot. They provide generous portions and for inexpensive rates. I liked the meals very much and the staff members were very attentive and informative. I recommend this place.
Nice
Best sushi, poke salad, saki and service from Sam and Nick...love this place.

Use take out food service for lunch.  They are very clean and safe practice restaurant.  Very good sushi too.
It's a bit pricey for the quality of the food.

I have been coming here with my girlfriend for more than a decade.  This is the most comfortable restaurant.  It's all family and each puts out 110% at least!  If you dont see it on the menu they will make it for you.  The food is fresh!!  Please call in take out to save the restaurant and this family!

Surprisingly good chirashi. Truly a hidden gem. What really caught my eye was the selection of Japanese ipa beers they had imported from Japan. They were truly a gem to find, especially in the East Bay.
All ways great food and service with a smile.  They g have a very well put Sakii menu and its regions.
i ordered a sashimi appetizer (6 pc), and asked to change it to the sashimi special (12pc). so they cut the original appetizer sashimi in half...

Yummy
One of the best sushi restaurants around. A wide variety of food as well. The tempura fried ice cream is a special treat.
Best Japanese restaurant in the area!
Gluten free friendly! The fish is great, everything is very tasty and the staff is so incredibly lovely! They just told me they can do gluten free tempura and I can't wait to try it!
Walked in one evening after the gym.... I was hooked. I am quickly becomjng a regular. Wonderful Sushi & everyone is just happy to see you. .

Always greeted with a smile and exceptional customer service. They're extremely knowledgeable on the dishes they cook.
So, so.
Best sushi in Hayward! Lovely folks running the place too. Always happy to grab some food here! :)
Sushi made by the owner! Awesome!
The sushi portions are great!
Good food ,fresh sushi , reasonable price. I had chicken teriyaki and a 49er sushi roll and 2 beers it was less than $30. I will return
We love going here it's so relaxing and friendly. The waiters remember us and the food is amazing.
The chirashi is fresh and delicious!
My husband and I have enjoyed dining at Sapporo for years. This family owned and operated Restaurant features traditional and also unique choices.
Good food.
Nice place I'm enjoy whit my family and very good foof

Sapporo has  a very good selection of sushi. All the ingredients are fresh. The flavors are good. Place is clean.  There's plenty of parking nearby. Staff was friendly , courteous and food arrived quickly.

Parking is on the street. Is easily accessible. One of the best Japanese places in the east bay. They have freshest sashimi and make a few special sushi dishes that you will not see anywhere. Service is quick and the staff is helpful and friendly. I highly recommend

Great service, had the a tempura appetizer,  crazy monkey and  Sapporo Sam rolls. Love spicy rolls but the crazy monkey was a bit overwhelming with spice, couldn't really taste the salmon. Tempura was really good and not overly battered.
Great food excellent service.

Nice sushi restaurant in Hayward. It serves multinational cuisines including Korean foods even though it is a Japanese restaurant basically. Quality of foods is really great and staffs are very kind and professional. Especially, the sakes …
I live in Hayward and drivin by here a thousand times and never been in until a few days ago. GO. Is a charming cozy place with great food and actual parking on Main St right next door.
Good quality sushi!
Friendly atmosphere the owner is really nice the employees treat everybody like equals

Came here alone and was surprised by the sake selection. Came back with my wife and thoroughly enjoyed the sunomono and fish specials. Maki is probably better than sashimi, really delicious. We never order a second round of food, but we did at Sapporo. Hello to my new favorite sushi place in the east bay.
Love their fresh oysters and chirashi. Seafood is fresh. But not every dish on the menu is delicious. Maybe it is my personal preference but I take Japanese cuisine in with high standard.

The Hamachi and maguro sushi was absolutely fresh, moist and delicious. The house sake was very yummy. I came at a most inconvenient time and I was treated with warm hospitality and good service. definitely recommend you have some sushi here.😋😋😋
Great atmosphere and even better food!
Never actually been there.
Relaxing atmosphere

Quiet, great food, friendly service and they have flights* of sake for those of us that are curious but clueless. Ton Katsu Donburi was delicious! *Tonight was their pilot offering of sake flights and I got the first one!
Amazing sushi and service!

i was hesitant to go to this place because every time we try new restaurant it's disappointing. however, we went there last night 02/08/19 the food was a delish!  definitely will come back to try other dishes.

Had sushi rolls and sashimi at our table. Enjoyed our meal and looking forward to giving a more complete review, when we sit at the sushi bar and have nigiri.

The catfish Tempura was fantastic. I liked the vibe of the restaurant. Food was good. I'll definitely come back in the future.
Have tried about one quarter of the menu and everything is great. The oysters are the freshest and best I've had in a long time.

Excellent!

Love this place.  Been coming here over 10 years on a regular basis.
As always, I loved my meal here!  The staff is always pleasant at friendly, the service crisp and efficient, and the fare excellent!  Highly recommended at any time! 😋
Delicious. Consistent. Quality.  I've been here a few times and each time the food is yum. I love the service, they are friendly, attentive and fast. Definite win for Hayward.
love them!

Family owned Japanese restaurant in the heart of downtown Hayward. They've got great rolls as well as options for those who don't eat seafood. I highly suggest the beef sukiyaki and tempura ice cream

Sam the owner is a very nice man. I think Sam makes the best sushi rolls around. They are great tasting good size and you cant beat the price
GREAT FOOD and GREAT SERVICE! The sushi chef knows his craft and he is personable to his customers. Great atmosphere for family or dating.

Older, well established Japanese food - sushi, tempura fish and quality ingredients.
It is the best sushi place in hayward best service and good prices

Gyoza and tempura are on point with the best sauce I've had at any restaurant. Also really good chicken teriyaki. My husband likes the sushi too. Hardly ever a wait to be seated our served. My favorite Japanese in downtown Hayward
I eat here all the time, it's my favorite place.

This place is a Hayward gem.  Fantastic sushi made by and served by a fantastic couple.  More often than not when we go it's not super busy so service is usually prompt, however, I could see it being a little slower if the place was …
I eat here often. Very friendly staff. If you love sushi, you will live Sapporo Restaurant.
Go here..if you like stale sushi.
Great place to eat. Prices are reasonable. For $30 you can get multiple dishes plus sake. All the food is great from the sushi, upon, and other dishes.

Excellent place for sushi in Hayward! Thank you Sapporo!
Excellent service.
Chef is so nice. Green mussels are amazing. Nothing special, just really good sushi.
excellent salad over rice.....love the fish too....
My favorite sushi place in Hayward. Chef and servers are the best. I've been eating there monthly for over 2 years now. You can never go wrong ordering the RAIDER roll :)
We are regular here. We love this place. Sushi chef and server are always friendly. They gave us extra food sometimes.
